page.title: 06Ferryside V.C.P.School.
page.content: {Ferryside school is Victorian.}It was built in {1856}by the church.The school was built with stone as walls and slate as a roof,but it was replaced with tile in 1978. The windows in the school building are big and high up.The old school building is made up of two large classrooms,a staffroom and three small cloakrooms.Later on people made a modern building for the infants. The school today has{78 children} and{4 teaching staff,2 kitchen staff } and{3 supervisory}assistants. In school we learn to{read}and{ {write.}We study{English,maths, {Welsh,science} and {art.}We also do { {music,cookery,games-rugby and netball. {The school is also bilingual.We have {to be able to speak both Welsh and {English by the time we are 11 years. { }
